channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Templately

item.title: CVE-2023-5454|2023-11-13T08:17:11.006Z -- unknown -- templately
item.description: The Templately WordPress plugin before 2.2.6 does not properly authorize the `saved-templates/delete` REST API call, allowing unauthenticated users to delete arbitrary posts.
